title: 79/435/EEC: Commission Decision of 17 April 1979 on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Title II of Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 17 April 1979  on the implementation of the reform of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Title II of Directive 75/268/EEC  (Only the Dutch text is authentic)  (79/435/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Decision of the Foundation for the Administration of Agricultural Land of 19 December 1978 on aid to less-favoured areas, notified by the Government of the Netherlands, satisfies the conditions for financial contribution by the Community to common measures as referred to in Article 13 of Directive 75/268/EEC and Article 15 of Directive 72/159/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 April 1979.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 128, 19.5.1975, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 96, 23.4.1972, p. 1.
